title: Requesting a sorted node collection for each node type
gherkin:
Given there exist 5 "<node_type>"s
When the user requests a "<node_type>" collection, sorted "asc" by "name"
Then the response should return with status code 200
And the response should return a collection of 5 "<node_type>"s

Examples:
  | node_type     |
  | COMPANY       |
  | BRAND         |
  | CAR MODEL     |
  | RACE TRACK    |
  | TRACK LAYOUT  |
  | RACING SERIES |
  | RACING EVENT  |
  | IMAGE         |
